data.eml:eml: A new cryptic, rupicolous species of Hemidactylus Oken, 1817 (Squamata: Gekkonidae) from Meghamalai, Tamil Nadu, India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chaitanya, R., Lajmi, Aparna, Giri, Varad B. (2018): A new cryptic, rupicolous species of Hemidactylus Oken, 1817 (Squamata: Gekkonidae) from Meghamalai, Tamil Nadu, India. Zootaxa 4374 (1): 49-70, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4374.1.3
